commands.name: vue:create-component
commands.description: Create Vue 3 component with TypeScript and Storybook
commands.prompt: Create a Vue 3 component with TypeScript, performance optimizations, and Storybook integration. Follow the monorepo structure and include proper testing.

commands.name: vue:create-package
commands.description: Create a new package in monorepo
commands.prompt: Create a new package in the monorepo structure with proper TypeScript configuration, testing setup, and Storybook integration.

commands.name: vue:create-api-service
commands.description: Create API service with WebSocket support
commands.prompt: Create an API service with WebSocket multiplexing, data batching, and proper error handling. Include TypeScript types and comprehensive testing.

commands.name: vue:create-storybook
commands.prompt: Create a comprehensive Storybook story for the current component with multiple variants, controls, and accessibility testing.

commands.name: vue:create-test
commands.prompt: Create a comprehensive test suite for the current file including unit tests, component tests, and performance tests.

commands.name: vue:add-performance
commands.prompt: Add performance optimizations to the current component including virtual scrolling, memoization, and proper cleanup.

commands.name: vue:create-pinia-store
commands.prompt: Create a Pinia store with TypeScript, proper state management, getters, actions, and comprehensive testing.

commands.name: vue:create-vuetify
commands.prompt: Create a Vuetify component wrapper with proper props, events, slots, and accessibility features.

commands.name: vue:create-tailwind
commands.prompt: Create a component using Tailwind CSS with responsive design, custom utilities, and proper styling patterns.

commands.name: vue:create-e2e
commands.prompt: Create a comprehensive Cypress E2E test for user flows with proper selectors, assertions, and error handling.

commands.name: vue:optimize-bundle
commands.prompt: Analyze and optimize the current bundle size, implement code splitting, tree shaking, and performance improvements.

commands.name: vue:create-docs
commands.prompt: Create comprehensive documentation for the current component including JSDoc, README, and usage examples.
